title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with 12 braking events.
caption: A blue car drives down a city street with palm trees and a hotel in the background.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNoon). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 4.0 m/s). There are 12 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
